author: tomj
msg: Correct config prarameter name in comments.

author: tomj
msg: Turn off 2-dimentional array serialization which .NET deserailizers
This is now a globalConfiguration property, which can be turned on or off

author: tomj
msg: Patch for bug 12509 from Jaime Meritt [jmeritt@sonicsoftware.com]:
The attached patch changes the error message generated in the log when
the server-config.wsdd file is not found in the
EngineConfigurationFactoryServlet.  This has been a source of confusion
when installing Axis in a servlet engine.  I have followed the best
practices for internationalization suggested by Russell (i.e. I didn't
erase the original message, I just added a new one).

author: vidyanand
msg: Fix for #15124. Whenever a xsd:include is encountered check whether the document corresponding to it has the attribute targetNamespace. If it doesn't have it add it

author: dims
msg: Use <cc> task from ant-contrib.sf.net. Cleanup unnecessary files.
